Treatment name 1
Notes reviewer 1:
Say they do an STC to avoid sample size shrinkage, but comes down to just giving an overimportant weights to patients irrelevant for the target population, and rely much more on the assumption of linearity of effects

MAIC would have been unfeasible, since it would have proven impossible to adjust for age: infringement to the positivity assumption. Acknowledge this limitation and say that it is still better to try any adjustment on something rather than conducting unadjusted ITC.
